entry.title: ronaks9065/backend-flow: A lightweight Node.js backend designed to demonstrate CI/CD pipeline automation. This repository focuses on building, testing, containerization, and seamless deployment to a Kubernetes cluster with a fully automated CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: walele993/blue_watchdog: Blue Watchdog is your vigilant guardian against unreliable APIs. This lightweight yet powerful package monitors endpoints for errors, latency spikes, and availability, automatically triggering circuit breakers to prevent system meltdowns. Perfect for microservices, third-party API integrations, or critical backend routes.
entry.content: Blue Watchdog is your vigilant guardian against unreliable APIs. This lightweight yet powerful package monitors endpoints for errors, latency spikes, and availability, automatically triggering circuit breakers to prevent system meltdowns. Perfect for microservices, third-party API integrations, or critical backend routes.
